resources.string:
About Activity - Activity that explains the content of each screen The text is saved in strings.xml 
 You can change the theme of app to Dark Mode using menu.

Home Activity - This is home screen 

RecycleView Activiry - Screen with recycle view with list of interesting locations to visit.
 Images source are urls.

This is smart application for the smart students.
 It contains list of restaurants around Cork.
 It allows you to navigate to MTU.
 It allows you to contact MTU by phone or email!
